1.3.0.0.100: ALTER TABLE user_devices ADD COLUMN messaging_server VARCHAR(100) AFTER region_code;
1.3.0.0.101: ALTER TABLE user_devices ADD COLUMN messaging_token_type VARCHAR(50) AFTER messaging_server;
1.3.0.0.102: ALTER TABLE activations ADD COLUMN resetpasscode_wipe int default 0;
1.3.0.0.103: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN ldap_dn varchar(250) default null;
1.3.0.1.100:
CREATE TABLE admins (
    email varchar(100),
    maindomain varchar(100),
    permissions text,
    createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL,
    updatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (email)
    );
1.3.0.1.101: ALTER TABLE orgs ADD COLUMN clientauthtype int default 1 AFTER passcodetype;
1.3.0.1.102: ALTER TABLE orgs ADD COLUMN secondauthmethod int default 3 AFTER clientauthtype;
1.3.0.1.103: ALTER TABLE activations ADD COLUMN biometric_token varchar(100) default '';
1.4.0.0.100: ALTER TABLE telephony_subscriptions ADD COLUMN maindomain varchar(100) AFTER deviceid;
1.4.0.0.101: ALTER TABLE telephony_local_numbers ADD COLUMN maindomain varchar(100) AFTER is_used;
1.4.0.0.102: ALTER TABLE user_devices ADD COLUMN last_login DATETIME AFTER messaging_token_type;
1.4.0.0.103: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN exchange_domain varchar(100) default '';
1.4.0.0.104: ALTER TABLE activations ADD COLUMN otp_token varchar(100) default '';
1.4.0.0.105: ALTER TABLE orgs ADD COLUMN otptype int default 0 AFTER secondauthmethod;
1.4.0.0.106: ALTER TABLE orgs ADD COLUMN watermark varchar(100) default '' AFTER otptype;
1.4.0.0.107: ALTER TABLE orgs MODIFY COLUMN watermark VARCHAR(2000);
1.4.0.0.108: ALTER TABLE platform_configs ADD COLUMN restartPlatformSessionsThreshold int default 0 AFTER fixedPool;
1.5.0.0.100: ALTER TABLE apps ADD COLUMN apptype varchar(20) default 'apk' AFTER packagename;
1.5.0.0.101: ALTER TABLE apps ADD COLUMN filename varchar(150) default '' AFTER apptype;
1.5.0.0.102: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN docker_image varchar(100) default '';
1.5.0.0.104: ALTER TABLE static_platforms ADD COLUMN ssh_port int default 22;
1.5.0.0.106:
CREATE TABLE images (
    maindomain varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    image_name varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    content_hash varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL,
    updatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (maindomain,image_name)
    );
1.5.0.0.110: ALTER TABLE platform_configs ADD COLUMN poolStrategy varchar(20) default 'calculated' AFTER dcName;
1.5.0.0.111:
CREATE TABLE session_history (
    session_id varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    email varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    device_id varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    maindomain varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    devicename varchar(100),
    start_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
    end_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
    platform int ,
    gateway int ,
    active_seconds int ,
    PRIMARY KEY (session_id)
    );
1.5.0.0.115: ALTER TABLE orgs ADD COLUMN recordingall int default 0 AFTER watermark;
1.5.0.0.116: ALTER TABLE orgs ADD COLUMN recordingretentiondays int default 3650 AFTER recordingall;
1.5.0.0.117: ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN recording int default 0 AFTER docker_image;
1.5.0.0.118: ALTER TABLE groups ADD COLUMN recording int default 0 AFTER distinguishedname;
1.5.0.0.119:
CREATE TABLE session_recordings (
    session_id varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    maindomain varchar(100) NOT NULL,
    start_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
    end_time DATETIME NOT NULL,
    active_seconds int ,
    file_name varchar(200) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (session_id,start_time)
    );
